description.heading: Junker Vehicles
description.description: Deliver low-value vehicles while focusing on careful handling to avoid further depreciation.

unlocks.heading: Junkers and beaters
unlocks.description: Older high-mileage beaters that perform very poorly.

description.heading: Used Vehicles
description.description: Deliver small and midsized vehicles, emphasizing efficiency and the maintenance of vehicle condition.

unlocks.heading: Gently used vehicles
unlocks.description: Small/Midsize vehicles of reasonable value and in good working condition.

description.heading: Large Vehicles
description.description: Deliver large vehicles and learn to adapt to their unique size and handling requirements.

unlocks.heading: Semi-trucks
unlocks.description: Larger vehicles and semi-trucks and other commercial vehicles.

description.heading: New Vehicles
description.description: Deliver new vehicles while ensuring they arrive in pristine condition.

unlocks.heading: Brand new vehicles
unlocks.description: Factory fresh vehicles in all sizes, complete with that new-car smell.

description.heading: Exotic Vehicles
description.description: Deliver top-tier vehicles, requiring exceptional care, discretion, and skill.

unlocks.heading: High-value Vehicles
unlocks.description: High-priced, high-speed, customized, rare classics, and other top-of-the-line vehicles
